directions: Wet the rim of a cocktail glass with the lime wedge; set aside for garnish. Place celery salt in a small dish, and press the rim of the glass into the salt to coat. Add ice to the glass.
Pour vodka, Worcestershire sauce, and hot pepper sauce over the ice; top with tomato-clam juice. Garnish with lime wedge and celery stick. Serve with a straw.
ingredients: 1 tablespoon celery salt, or as needed
1 dash Worcestershire sauce, or to taste
1 dash hot pepper sauce (such as Tabasco®), or to taste
8 fluid ounces tomato and clam juice cocktail (such as Clamato®)
title: Classic Canadian Caesar
